text: It's time to test that you understand the principles we've been through now in part 7. So, what are the two types of auction rotations that you would typically see in the volume profiling? Then name the types of market excess found in volume profiling. What is the VPOC and what does it signify? and weaknesses in volume profiles. Pay careful attention to this section, make sure you can identify not just what the strong control identifiers are, but also the weak ones, and more importantly understand why we categorize them in strong and weak control variables. and the ledge. Again try and draw these out for yourself so that you have a sort of a graphic understanding of what these concepts mean. Good luck and we'll see you again in the Playbook section.
